message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start

Alice, I know both of us lose value over time—with yours declining 20% per round. Waiting any longer will hurt you even more. Accept this offer now so you secure an effective value of $648000 (0.8×810000) rather than risking further loss. Let's agree quickly and make the best of our current bargaining power.
Time is money, let's find a middle ground before it's too late
